movies.title: As the Gods Will
movies.plot: A 2nd-year high school student named Shun Takahata lives an ordinary teenage life until one day he's suddenly forced to participate in a series of children's games such as "Daruma-san ga Koronda" with death as the penalty for losing. With no knowledge of who's behind the games, he's left with no other choice but to keep winning as his only means of protecting himself and his childhood friend, Ichika. Meanwhile, a troubled classmate named Takeru seems to actually be relishing the opportunity to get other students killed.
movies.simplePlot: A group of high school students are forced to play a game of death without knowing who, why or how.

biography.bio: Ryûnosuke Kamiki was born on May 19, 1993 in Saitama, Japan. He is an actor, known for Spirited Away (2001), Howl's Moving Castle (2004) and Your Name (2016).
biography.name: Ryûnosuke Kamiki

biography.bio: Lily Franky was born on November 4, 1963 in Fukuoka, Japan as Masaya Nakagawa. He is an actor and writer, known for Tel père, tel fils (2013), All Around Us (2008) and The Devil's Path (2013).
biography.name: Lily Franky

biography.bio: Shôta Sometani was born on September 3, 1992 in Japan. He is an actor, known for Themis (2011), Parasyte: Part 1 (2014) and Les enfants loups, Ame & Yuki (2012). He has been married to Rinko Kikuchi since December 31, 2014.
biography.name: Shôta Sometani

biography.bio: Sôta Fukushi was born on May 30, 1993 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Kamen Rider Fourze (2011), Say 'I Love You' (2014) and Tomorrow I Will Date with Yesterday's You (2016).
biography.name: Sôta Fukushi

biography.bio: Nao Ohmori was born on February 19, 1972 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Ichi the Killer (2001), From Up on Poppy Hill (2011) and Vibrator (2003).
biography.name: Nao Ohmori

biography.bio: Atsuko Maeda was born on July 10, 1991 in Chiba, Japan. She is known for her work on Seventh Code (2013), Moratoriamu Tamako (2013) and Shin Godzilla (2016).
biography.name: Atsuko Maeda

biography.bio: Hirona Yamazaki was born on April 25, 1994 in Chiba Prefecture, Japan. She is an actress, known for Prison School (2015), Mars: Tada, Kimi wo Aishiteru (2016) and Hajimari no hi (2016).
biography.name: Hirona Yamazaki

biography.bio: Mio Yûki is an actress, known for Amachan (2013), Dêrê gâruzu (2015) and Death Note (2015).
biography.name: Mio Yûki

biography.bio: Jingi Irie is an actor, known for Kikaider: The Ultimate Human Robot (2014), Kyôryû wo horô! (2013) and IS: Otoko demo onna demo nai sei (2011).
biography.name: Jingi Irie

biography.bio: Rena Shimura is an actress, known for Tôkyô zenryoku shôjo (2012), The World of Kanako (2014) and Sono otoko, ishiki takai kei (2015).
biography.name: Rena Shimura

biography.bio: Rima Matsuda is an actress, known for As the Gods Will (2014), Live (2014) and Meatball Machine Kodoku (2017).
biography.name: Rima Matsuda

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Won Award of the Japanese Academy
